com.inrix.sdk.utils

Class RouteCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.utils.RouteCodec

  • public class RouteCodec
extends java.lang.Object
    Encodes and decodes routes points with timestamps. Uses modified Google Polyline encoding algorithm. INRIX-Iurii-Okhmat
